trauma.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an unpleasant and upsetting experience that affects you for a long time
trauma.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: traumas such as death or divorce
trauma.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a mental state of extreme shock caused by a very frightening or unpleasant experience
trauma.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: the trauma of being a young refugee
